src:
Pobede Fortune i Šalkea za kraj 10. kola Bundeslige
03 Nov 2019, 20:18 by Zile
U Dizeldorfu su slavili domaći, a u Augzburgu gostujući fudbaleri.
Fortuni su bodovi protiv Kelna bili neophodni, ali su i „jarčevi“ bili u istoj situaciji. Obe ekipe imale su samo po sedam bodova iz 9 kola, ali sada tim iz Dizeldorfa lakše diše. Dakle, komšijski derbi pripao je Fortuni, koja je golovima Heningsa sa bele tačke u 38. minutu i Tomija, posle solo akcije u 61. stigla do treće pobede u sezoni.
Mnogo više uzbuđenja bilo je u Augzburgu gde je istoimeni domaćin dva puta vodio, a na kraju je ostao i bez boda. Bajer je doveo Augzburg u vođstvo u 38. minutu, ali je autogol Lihštajnera u poslednjem minutu prvog dela vratio egal na semaforu.
Islanđanin Finbogason je precizno izveo jedanaesterac u 60. minutu i doneo novu prednost domaćinu. Desetak minuta kasnije Kabak je glavom, posle ubacivanja iz slobodnog udarca, izjednačio na 2:2, da bi spretni Harit u 82. minutu iskoristio grešku defanzivaca Augzburga i doneo trijumf Šalkeu.
Ekipa iz Gelzenkirhena je sada na 6. mestu sa 18 bodova, koliko ima i Lajpcig na trećem mestu, ali sa boljom gol razlikom. Augzburg je pao u zonu ispadanja i sada je 16. sa 7 bodova.
Fortuna – Keln 2:0(1:0)Henings 38′(p), Tomi 61′
Augzburg – Šalke 2:3(1:1)Bajer 38′, Finbogason 60′(p) – Lihštajner 45+1′(ag), Kabak 71′, Harit 82′

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Fortune and Schalke wins for round 10 of the Bundesliga
03 Nov 2019, 19:18 by Zile
In Dusseldorf, home and away football players were celebrating in Augsburg.
Fortune points against Cologne were necessary, but the "goats" were in the same situation. Both teams had just seven points from round 9, but now the team from Dusseldorf breathes easier. So, a neighbor's derby was attributed to Fortuna, who scored Henning's goals from the white spot in the 38th minute and Tommy, after a solo action in the 61st, reached her third win of the season.
There was much more excitement in Augsburg, where the host of the same name led twice, eventually losing a point. Bayer led Augsburg to the lead in the 38th minute, but a goal by Liechtenstein in the last minute of the first part returned egal to the scoreboard.
Iceland's Finbogason delivered a fine shot 60 minutes into the match and gave the home side a new lead. Ten minutes later, Kabak equalized after 2 minutes to take the free kick to 2: 2, for a deft Harit in the 82nd minute to exploit the mistake of the Augsburg defenders and bring Schalke a triumph.
The Gelsenkirchen team is now in 6th place with 18 points, just like Leipzig in third place, but with a better goal difference. Augsburg has fallen into the relegation zone and is now 16th with 7 points.
Fortuna - Cologne 2: 0 (1: 0) Henings 38 ′ (p), Tommy 61 ′
Augsburg - Schalke 2: 3 (1: 1) Bayer 38 ′, Finbogason 60 ′ (p) - Liechtenstein 45 + 1 ′ (ag), Kabak 71 ′, Harit 82 ′
